message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
You wanted fair, now it's your turn to negotiate!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more for my efforts!
You're getting desperate, Alice. Time to make a serious offer!
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just getting smart. You're not getting the better deal, Bob!
You're not getting the better deal, Alice. This is my best offer so far!
You're not getting rich off me, Bob. This is my final offer!
You're not serious about the money, Alice. This is my last offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going down without a fight, Bob. This is my last chance to get a decent deal.
You're not even trying to negotiate, Alice. I'm taking what's left.
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I won't be taken advantage of.
This is my last chance to get the majority of the money. Take it or we both get nothing!
